search.name: Comic Strip
search.description:
Displays a daily comic strip in a popup window.
Switches:
(Note: All the switches can be abbreviated)
9 Chickweed Lane/9chickweed
A Case in Point/caseinpoint
Adam at Home/adamathome
Agnes/agnes
Alley Oop/alleyoop
